class.name: velodyne/VelodynePointCloudNodelet
class.description: Publish complete velodyne scan as point cloud (deprecated).

class.name: velodyne/VelodyneDriverNodelet
class.description: Publish raw Velodyne data over ROS.

class.name: velodyne/VelodyneProjectorNodelet
class.description: Subscribe to raw Velodyne packets and project to usable XYZ values.

class.name: velodyne/VelodyneToPointCloudNodelet
class.description: Subscribe to raw Velodyne packets and project to PointCloud2
